name: 2D Platformer Modified (Her_Call)
description:
This is the final version of my 2D Platformer. 

These are the following modifications that have been implemented:

1.  Varied enemies, increased health, different movement speeds, Enemy Boss

2.  Cosmetic changes to the map and enemies

3.  Different mechanics and environments due to arena changes.

Credits-

Created by Ricky McKay
